title: [Bug] Sometimes gradient doesn't back-propagate after view
body_html:
Issue description

Gradient doesn't back-propagate after view

Code example

import torch

x1 = torch.rand(5).requires_grad_()
x1 = x1.view((-1, 1))
x1.sum().backward()
print(x1.grad)

x1 = torch.rand(5).requires_grad_()
x1.sum().backward()
print(x1.grad)

Output

None
tensor([ 1.,  1.,  1.,  1.,  1.])

## Issue description

Gradient doesn't back-propagate after `view`

## Code example

```
import torch

x1 = torch.rand(5).requires_grad_()
x1 = x1.view((-1, 1))
x1.sum().backward()
print(x1.grad)

x1 = torch.rand(5).requires_grad_()
x1.sum().backward()
print(x1.grad)
```

Output

```
None
tensor([ 1.,  1.,  1.,  1.,  1.])
```
